This Documentation means to provide both a comprehensive source of information about **CCPhos** as well as facilitate its cooperative approach. Following the general ideas of [Open Science](https://www.fosteropenscience.eu/learning/what-is-open-science/#/id/5ab8ea32dd1827131b90e3ac), we thus hope to achieve a high degree of transparency and reproducibility in our conduct of research.

\
